message: Take it or leave it, Alice!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a better deal than that!
You're not getting any younger either, Bob! Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to back down, Alice. You're going to have to do better than that!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not going to give in now!
I'm not going to give up, Alice. You're going to have to make a serious offer if you want to get rid of me!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to settle for anything less than a fair share, Alice. You're going to have to do better than that if you want to get rid of me!
This is my last serious offer, Bob. Take it or leave it, but don't say I didn't warn you!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
